H0.text: On Sept 18, 1947, which branch of the US Military became an independent branch, following 40 years under the leadership of the Army. United States Space Force

H1.text: On Sept 18, 1947, which branch of the US Military became an independent branch, following 40 years under the leadership of the Army. United States Navy

H2.text: On Sept 18, 1947, which branch of the US Military became an independent branch, following 40 years under the leadership of the Army. United States Marine Corps

H3.text: On Sept 18, 1947, which branch of the US Military became an independent branch, following 40 years under the leadership of the Army. USAF

A4.text: but it was not until 18 September 1947, when the first secretary of the Air Force, W. Stuart Symington, was sworn into office that the Air Force was officially formed as an independent service branch.

A5.text: The act created the National Military Establishment (renamed Department of Defense in 1949), which was composed of three subordinate Military Departments, namely the Department of the Army, the Department of the Navy, and the newly created Department of the Air Force.
